ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Mentored Clinical Experience is a class that allows you to acquire or experience medical knowledge of diseases, translational research, organ pathology, and patients. I would highly recommend this course, because it is the only course I know of that gives such a comprehensive understanding of everything from how research on a disease is done at the preclinical level to how patients are treated for these diseases.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It is very helpful to see how clinicians approach research and unanswered questions in their fields.

This course taught me to keep "the patient" in mind while doing my basic research. It also helped me to make connections with individuals who are treating the types of patients that I am trying to help with my dissertation/research.
